REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3324 reute d f BC-INTERNATIONAL-FINE-FO 03-16 0061

TEXT.TITLE: INTERNATIONAL FINE FOODS MAKES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: <International Fine Foods Inc> said it has acquired 2001 Distributors Inc of West Babylon, N.Y., for 875,000 common shares, plus contingent shares based on future earnings. 2001 distributes fresh-squeezed juices and had a loss on sales of about one mln dlrs in 1986, its first year of operation. Reuter
